text: Palghar (Sai Baba Temple) is an ancient temple that lies in Vevoor, in the Palghar district of Maharashtra, India. The Sai Baba temple of Vevoor is located approximately 1 km from palghar(E) station. As per the legend of this temple, Lord Saibaba and including a small temple of Shiva. It was in the year of approximately 2008. Monday and Thursdays the two important days in a week when special poojas and artis are held. Thousands of devotees visit the temple during religious fairs and processions held every year. ==References== Category:Temples in Maharashtra
title: Palghar (Sai Baba temple)
